title: Yor Community Tailor
description: A digital marketing campaign for Yor Community Tailor that showcases local craftsmanship and connects tailors with their community.
challenge: Creating a digital campaign that highlights traditional tailoring skills while making the service accessible to a modern, digitally-connected audience.
solution: We developed a multi-channel digital campaign featuring authentic storytelling, showcasing master tailors at work, and implementing an interactive booking system that bridges traditional craftsmanship with modern convenience.
